overview:
As of 2012, Kevin Perry is 29 years old and lives in Ontario, Canada. He’s passionate about a lot of things; mainly making a living by working online.

Kevin the Manager of North American Operations for 6StarMedia.com. 6StarMedia.com is a website design and marketing company that works with corporations, businesses, professionals, and hobbyists to expand their online presence. Our expertise includes website design, seo marketing, ppc marketing, business consulting, business strategy, business plan development, graphical design and copyrighting.

Kevin is also the co-owner of NicheBang.com. A company that builds niche topic websites for customers looking for a cheap investment alternative with big ROI potential. Currently, NicheBang.com is offering a 100% ROI on any package purchased. We are also in development of a new NicheBang service called Business in a Box that will allow clients to have exclusive selling rights for selling NicheBang packages at a 50% commission.

Aside from his online life, Kevin is a passionate dog owner and advocate for the humane treatment of all animals. He currently has a 3 year old Chocolate Lab and his goal in the future is to get more property to be able to take in unwanted dogs that have been neglected.

Kevin has also recently developed a passion for collecting Canadian coinsâ€¦specifically silver coins and coloured circulation quarters. His favourites include the poppy coins, and especially the 2004 poppy edition, which was the first ever coloured circulation coin in the world! Aside from collecting, Kevin also sell coins on Ebay.
